import requests
import json
import pandas as pd

url = "https://api.spacexdata.com/v5/launches"
headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json"}

response = requests.get(url)
data = response.json()

df_pandas = pd.json_normalize(
    data,
    record_path=['cores'],
    meta=[
        'flight_number',
        'name',
        'date_utc',
        'date_local',
        'date_unix',
        'date_precision',
        'success',
        'rocket',
        'launchpad',
        'upcoming',
        'details',
        'auto_update',
        'tbd',
        'id'
    ],
    errors='ignore',
    sep="_"
)

# Then safely extract failure reason
df_pandas['failure_reason'] = [
    d.get('failures')[0]['reason'] if (d.get('failures') and len(d.get('failures')) > 0) else None
    for d in data
]

df_pandas = pd.json_normalize(
				data,  # your list of dicts\n",
				meta=[
				    'flight_number',
				    'mission_name',
					'launch_year',
					'launch_date_utc',
					'launch_success',
					['rocket', 'rocket_id'],
					['rocket', 'rocket_name'],
					['rocket', 'rocket_type'],
					['launch_site', 'site_name'],
					['launch_failure_details', 'reason']
					],
					record_path=['rocket', 'second_stage', 'payloads'],  # nested array to flatten\n",
					errors='ignore'
				)
